configurations.name: http://app.get('/api/stuff/:id', (req, res, next) => {  Thing.findOne({ _id: req.params.id })    .then(thing => res.status(200).json(thing))    .catch(error => res.status(404).json({ error }));});
configurations.url: http://app.get('/api/stuff/:id', (req, res, next) => {  Thing.findOne({ _id: req.params.id })    .then(thing => res.status(200).json(thing))    .catch(error => res.status(404).json({ error }));});
